mapper.select: select pnonce as nonce, premote_addr as remoteAddr, pused_count as usedCount, psession_info as sessionInfo, pused_time as usedTime, pcreator as creator, pcreated as created from PSYSONETIMEPASSWORD where pnonce = #{nonce}

select a.obid as obid ,a.pnames as names ,a.pfrom_obid as from_obid ,a.ptitles as titles ,a.pflags as flags ,a.pfile_store as file_store ,a.pfile_format as file_format ,a.passigned_type as assigned_type ,a.pdescriptions as descriptions ,a.pclass_name as class_name ,a.plife_cycle as life_cycle ,a.plocker as locker ,a.psizes as sizes ,a.pstates as states ,a.puser_file_name as user_file_name ,a.pcheckouter as checkouter ,a.pcheckouted as checkouted ,a.pfile_path as file_path ,a.psys_file_name as sys_file_name ,a.powner as owner ,a.pfile_location as file_location ,a.pfile_timestamp as file_timestamp ,a.pcreator as creator ,a.pcreated as created ,a.pattribute01 as attribute01 ,a.pattribute02 as attribute02 ,a.pmodifier as modifier ,a.pattribute03 as attribute03 ,a.pmodified as modified ,a.pattribute04 as attribute04 ,a.pattribute05 as attribute05 ,a.pattribute06 as attribute06 ,a.pattribute07 as attribute07 ,a.pattribute08 as attribute08 ,a.pattribute09 as attribute09 ,a.pattribute10 as attribute10 ,a.pattribute11 as attribute11 ,a.pattribute12 as attribute12 ,a.pattribute13 as attribute13 ,a.pattribute14 as attribute14 ,a.pattribute15 as attribute15 from ptfile a where 1 = 1 and a.pfrom_obid = #{fromObid}
and a.pfile_format = #{fileFormat}
